description:
Nicely furnished 3 bed 2 bath in the East Village. 3 queen beds and one sizable couch. In the most vibrant neighborhood of Downtown Manhattan. Located in Alphabet City right off of Houston St the location has the best galleries, bars and clubs of the LES and East Village. Close to the New Museum and restaurants like Katz Deli, Lucien, Russ and Daughters! 5 minutes to the F train, 15 minutes to Soho/Greenwich Village and 5 minutes away from Tompkins Square Park. Washer and dryer on site +elevator

Feel free to contact either one of us throughout your stay in the city for any sort of recommendation!
name: Chic East Village 3BR/2BA with stunning roof view
review: The host canceled this reservation 78 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
